Today, I am very honored to recognize February 9, 2025, as the first ever Gulf of America Day.

articles.author: Sam Sabin
articles.title: Musk's "move fast, break things" ethos threatens U.S. security, experts warn - Axios
articles.description: Rapid overhauls of government IT systems, without regard for national security, are putting Americans at risk, lawmakers and former officials say.
articles.content: Silicon Valley's speed-over-safety mindset is colliding with Washington's reality that messing with government IT can open the door for China, Russia, and other adversaries to infiltrate critical U.S… [+4617 chars]
